channel.title: mycatalog updates
channel.description: 'My Catalog' uses the IBM Cloud catalog API to retrieve data from the catalog. It attempts to be as accurate as possible. This feed shows additions, updates, removals from the catalog. Use with care. It is a work-in-progress :)

item.title: [updated] Security and Compliance Center Workload Protection (sysdig-secure) has changed the description of the plan named free-trial
item.description:
*before*: Free for 30 days.
Free trial plans with the data are deleted after 30 days after expiration.
Note the Workload Protection agent and the IBM Cloud Monitoring agent cannot be deployed on the same cluster. However, you can access Workload Protection functionality through IBM Cloud Monitoring by selecting the Graduated Tier - Sysdig Secure + Monitor plan. For more information refer to: https://test.cloud.ibm.com/docs/monitoring?topic=monitoring-service_plans, *after*: Free for 30 days.
Free trial plans with the data are deleted after 30 days after expiration.
Note the Workload Protection agent and the IBM Cloud Monitoring agent cannot be deployed on the same cluster. However, you can access Workload Protection functionality through IBM Cloud Monitoring by selecting the Graduated Tier - Sysdig Secure + Monitor plan. For more information refer to: https://cloud.ibm.com/docs/monitoring?topic=monitoring-service_plans

item.title: [updated] Security and Compliance Center Workload Protection (sysdig-secure) has changed the description of the plan named graduated-tier
item.description:
*before*: Image scan results, compliance results, policy events, activity audit and forensic captures are accessible and retained for 90 days.
Cost is for each node hour. For example if you are running one agent for 24 hours a day and the month has 30 days, the estimated cost is approximately $55 USD.
*CSPM capabilities are currently free for a promotional period
Note the Workload Protection agent and the IBM Cloud Monitoring agent cannot be deployed on the same cluster. However, you can access Workload Protection functionality through IBM Cloud Monitoring by selecting the Graduated Tier - Sysdig Secure + Monitor plan. For more information refer to: https://test.cloud.ibm.com/docs/monitoring?topic=monitoring-service_plans, *after*: Image scan results, compliance results, policy events, activity audit and forensic captures are accessible and retained for 90 days.
Cost is for each node hour. For example if you are running one agent for 24 hours a day and the month has 30 days, the estimated cost is approximately $55 USD.
*CSPM capabilities are currently free for a promotional period
Note the Workload Protection agent and the IBM Cloud Monitoring agent cannot be deployed on the same cluster. However, you can access Workload Protection functionality through IBM Cloud Monitoring by selecting the Graduated Tier - Sysdig Secure + Monitor plan. For more information refer to: https://cloud.ibm.com/docs/monitoring?topic=monitoring-service_plans

item.title: [updated] Partner with Technology Expert Labs (consult-with-icg-wes) is the new name of Consult with IBM Garage
